title: Settings

apiKeyHint: Multiple API keys supported, separated by commas. System will rotate automatically.

atLeastOneRole: At least one role is required
followStepsToCreateTables: Follow these steps to create table structure

step3PasteAndRun: Paste SQL script and click "Run" to execute

scriptCreatesTablesAndIndexes: This script creates 11 tables with indexes and policies
newVersionFoundUpgrade: New version found, please execute upgrade script manually
step1CopyUpgradeSql: Click the button below to copy upgrade SQL script
configureAnalysisPrompt: Configure system prompt for AI Prompt analysis
analysisPromptDescription: This prompt guides AI on how to analyze and evaluate your Prompt. You can customize analysis dimensions, scoring criteria, and output format. Ensure AI can still return valid JSON format after modification.
testModelCapabilities: Test image and PDF processing capabilities of configured models
testSupportedDesc: Model successfully processed test file and returned response
testFailedDesc: Model failed to process file or returned error
testNotSupportedDesc: Capability not enabled based on model configuration
testSkippedDesc: Dependent capability not passed (e.g., PDF requires image support first)
configureDbFirst: Please configure database connection in "Database" tab first
supabaseManualMigration: Supabase requires manual migration script execution in Dashboard

supabaseAutoMigration: Supabase table structure is auto-managed via migrations
dbConfigSavedRefresh: Database configuration saved, page will refresh...
anthropicNoAutoFetch: Anthropic does not support auto fetch, please add models manually
providerNoAutoFetch: This provider type does not support auto fetch
dbConfigDesc: Select and configure data storage method
dbIsolationWarning: Data in different databases is completely isolated. After switching databases, you will see data from that database.
supabaseConnectionHint: After creating a project on supabase.com, get connection info from Settings > API
pendingMigrationsHint: {{count}} pending migrations. Click "Upgrade Table Structure" button to get upgrade script.
dbUpToDate: Database structure is up to date.
supabaseFirstTimeHint: For first time Supabase use, click "Initialize Table Structure" button to get SQL script
mysqlWarningTitle: Notes for using self-hosted MySQL database:
mysqlWarning1: You need to deploy backend service to connect to MySQL database
mysqlWarning2: Please refer to backend code in project server/ directory
mysqlWarning3: If you don't have backend development experience, Supabase is recommended (no backend needed)
mysqlFirstTimeHint: Initialize table structure for first time MySQL use. Existing data won't be affected if tables exist.
mysqlPendingMigrationsHint: {{count}} pending migrations. Click "Upgrade Table Structure" button to upgrade.
defaultAnalysisPrompt:
You are a professional Prompt Engineer, skilled at analyzing and optimizing AI Prompts.
Please analyze the user-provided Prompt and give improvement suggestions from the following dimensions:

1. **Clarity**: Is the Prompt clearly expressed, without ambiguity
2. **Structure**: Is the Prompt structure reasonable, with clear sections
3. **Specificity**: Are the instructions specific enough, with clear constraints
4. **Examples**: Are examples needed to help the model understand
5. **Constraints**: Are there necessary output format, length, style constraints

Scoring criteria (0-100):
- 90-100: Excellent, almost no improvement needed
- 70-89: Good, some minor improvements possible
- 50-69: Average, obvious room for improvement
- 0-49: Needs significant improvement

Please strictly return the analysis result in the following JSON format, without other content:
{
  "score": number,
  "summary": "Overall evaluation (1-2 sentences)",
  "strengths": ["Strength 1", "Strength 2"],
  "suggestions": [
    {
      "type": "clarity|structure|specificity|examples|constraints",
      "title": "Suggestion title (brief)",
      "description": "Detailed explanation of why this improvement is needed",
      "originalText": "Original text that needs improvement (if specific text exists)",
      "suggestedText": "Suggested replacement text (if specific suggestion exists)",
      "severity": "low|medium|high"
    }
  ]
}

Notes:
- originalText and suggestedText are optional, only provide when there are specific text replacement suggestions
- severity indicates importance: high=must improve, medium=should improve, low=optional improvement
- Keep suggestions to 3-6 items, sorted by importance
- If the Prompt is already good, return only 1-2 low priority suggestions or empty array
fileOcrSettingsDesc: Convert PDF/images to text for text-only models.
enableFileOcrHint: When enabled, file upload is available only for models without vision support.
apiKeyPlaceholder: Leave blank to keep existing key
apiKeyWillBeCleared: API key will be cleared on save
systemOcrProviderConfigDesc: Configure built-in PaddleOCR/PaddleOCR-VL/Datalab endpoints and keys (admins only).
